short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Convert Highlighted Text to Speech' feature enables users to listen to the content they select on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Convert Highlighted Text to Speech" extension allows users to listen to selected text on a webpage, offering an alternative way to consume content. It enhances accessibility by catering to individuals with visual impairments or those who prefer auditory learning. Users can customize the listening experience by adjusting the pitch, speed, and accent of the speech. Additionally, the feature supports both dark and light modes, ensuring a seamless experience in various lighting conditions
